cycling

Class Climb

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.Entity
      • cycling.Checkpoint
        • cycling.Climb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class Climb
extends Checkpoint
    The Climb class is a subclass of Checkpoint and is used to represent a climb in a stage.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    730003140, 730002704

    • Constructor Detail

      • Climb

        protected Climb(CheckpointType type,
                java.lang.Double location,
                java.lang.Double length,
                java.lang.Double avgGradient,
                Stage parentStage)
         throws InvalidLocationException,
                InvalidStageStateException,
                InvalidStageTypeException
        Constructor for the Climb class.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of checkpoint it is
        location - the location of the checkpoint
        length - the length of the climb
        avgGradient - the average gradient of the climb
        parentStage - the stage that the checkpoint is in
        Throws:
        InvalidLocationException - if the location is out of range of the stage
        InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is not in the correct state
        InvalidStageTypeException - if the stage is not of the correct type
